title: ISic020474. ISic020474
body:
Facsimile Images

Μνασιθάλε̄ς ἀνέθε̄κε Ἀντιφάμο̄ι

Apparatus criticus

Text after Arena (IGASM 2)

English translation

Mnasithales dedicated (me) to Antiphamos.

Italian translation

Mnasithales (mi) ha dedicato ad Antifemo.

commentary

According to most scholars (cf. among others Arena, IGASM, no. 27; Dubois, IGDS, no. 135) this inscription testifies to the existence in Gela of the cult of the oecist Antiphamos, whose name is also known from the passage in Thucydides on the foundation of the apoikia (Thuc. 6.4.3).

bibliography

    Guarducci 1949-1951 107-109 fig. 3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001929 Adamesteanu 1959 430-432 tav. L.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002658 Arena 2002 27, pl. XI.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001373 Dubois 1989 135 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000187 Jeffery 1990 278 no.53 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000678 Jeffery 1961 278 no.53 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000677
